attributes.action: Improve Access To Work funding so disabled people aren't left with out support
attributes.additional_details: Funding for disabled people in work has been drastically cut in recent years.  This means that they could be left with out support or have to wait longer.  Access To Work helps to provide funding which disabled people can use to pay for support, however on many occasions payments are missed and just topped up in one large amount.  Amounts should be paid on a regular basis and not just in one large amount. Claims should also take less time to process.
attributes.background: I want the Government to improve Access To Work so disabled people who need funding get it when they need it and don't have to eat in to what little savings they may have

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about how the Access to Work scheme currently operates, but we're not sure exactly what changes you want to be made to this scheme,

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
